DOC.brief_title: Effect Fenofibrate Kidney Function : Six-week Randomized Cross-over Trial Healthy People
DOC.criteria: Male female Age : 3060 year old Subjects normal renal function document : Plasma creatinine < 130 µmol/L , AND Cockcroft & Gault creatinine clearance ( Co Cr CL ) > 80 ml/min Certified normal comprehensive medical assessment laboratory investigation result within normal range /or clinically acceptable present subject negative urinary screen drug abuse . Written inform consent Body Mass Index ( BMI ) ≥ 30 kg/m² < 18 kg/m² . Pregnant , breastfeeding , woman child bear potential without reliable method contraception . Having receive investigational drug last 90 day date inclusion . With known hypersensitivity fibrates . Unable unwilling comply protocol , likely leave study completion . Who would undertake important change physical exercise vigorous sport competition study period . Drug therapy permit study , except contraceptive pill applicable , exception occasional use paracetamol . Any administration treatment , could bring induction inhibition hepatic microsomal enzyme within 3 month study start . Diabetes mellitus , Heart diseases , Kidney diseases , hypertension , asthma , Liver diseases , Chronic pancreatitis , identify risk know history acute pancreatitis , Known cholelithiasis without cholecystectomy , ASAT and/or ALAT > 1.3 time ULN , Gastric peptic ulcer intestinal disease , Musculoskeletal diseases increase CK > 1.0 time ULN , History neoplasm , Mental illness , Regular user sedative , hypnotic , tranquilliser addictive agent know prone alcohol abuse ( i.e . history evidence acute abuse ) , alcohol intake > 14 unit per week ( unit = ½ pint beer , 1 glass wine , 2,5 cl standard spirit ) , heavy smoker ( > 10 cigarettes/day ) , excessive drinker tea , coffee and/or beverage contain caffeine ( > 8 cups/day ) , Blood donor recent donation ( three month precede initiation study ) would make blood donation study , Blood transfusion administration bloodderived product , year preceding study .
